At	your	first	booking	appointment	
you	should	have	a	scan	to	confirm	
when your baby is due (in some 
areas the scan may be slightly after 
you have your booking visit). Your 
due date by ultrasound scan will be 
used rather than the date of your 
last period as it is a more accurate 
way of predicting your due date. You 
will be asked lots of questions about 
your medical history, your fa
